name: Granny's Cleaning Day
overview: A Game and Watch Homage, where you are a boy living in an apartment with two floors, and the only way to enjoy his hobby of playing with balls, is by bringing them downstairs. The only problem is, today of all days is 'Granny's Cleaning Day'. Pick up the balls and bring them downstairs as fast as possible, avoid Granny's powerful hoover, make sure she doesn't suck up your hobby, and use the phone to distract her and change her direction. So good luck, as you only have a limited amount of lives!
